derive.sql: SELECT time_start, time_end, AVG(tmp_value) AS value FROM ( select TRUNC( qv_time_start, 'HH24' ) AS time_start, TRUNC( qv_time_start, 'HH24' ) + INTERVAL '1' HOUR AS time_end, qv_dvalue * 100 / qv_dconfig as tmp_value FROM sge_queue_values WHERE qv_variable = 'slots' AND qv_parent = (SELECT q_id FROM sge_queue WHERE q_qname = __key_0__ AND q_hostname = __key_1__) AND qv_time_start <= {ts '__time_end__'} AND qv_time_end > {ts '__time_start__'} ) GROUP BY time_start, time_end

SELECT time_start, time_end, COUNT(*) AS value FROM ( SELECT TRUNC( ju_end_time, 'HH24' ) AS time_start, TRUNC( ju_end_time, 'HH24' ) + INTERVAL '1' HOUR AS time_end, sge_job_usage.* FROM sge_job_usage WHERE ju_hostname = __key_0__ AND ju_end_time <= {ts '__time_end__'} AND ju_end_time > {ts '__time_start__'} ) GROUP BY time_start, time_end

SELECT time_start, time_end, COUNT(*) AS value FROM ( SELECT TRUNC( ju_end_time, 'HH24' ) AS time_start, TRUNC( ju_end_time, 'HH24' ) + INTERVAL '1' HOUR AS time_end, sge_job_usage.*, sge_job.* FROM sge_job, sge_job_usage WHERE j_owner = __key_0__ AND j_id = ju_parent AND ju_end_time <= {ts '__time_end__'} AND ju_end_time > {ts '__time_start__'} ) GROUP BY time_start, time_end

SELECT time_start, time_end, COUNT(*) AS value FROM ( SELECT TRUNC( ju_end_time, 'HH24' ) AS time_start, TRUNC( ju_end_time, 'HH24' ) + INTERVAL '1' HOUR AS time_end, sge_job_usage.*, sge_job.* FROM sge_job, sge_job_usage WHERE j_project = __key_0__ AND j_id = ju_parent AND ju_end_time <= {ts '__time_end__'} AND ju_end_time > {ts '__time_start__'} ) GROUP BY time_start, time_end

SELECT time_start, time_end, AVG(hv_dvalue) as value FROM ( SELECT TRUNC( hv_time_start , 'DDD' ) as time_start, TRUNC( hv_time_start , 'DDD' ) + INTERVAL '1' DAY as time_end, hv_dvalue FROM sge_host_values WHERE hv_variable = 'h_jobs_finished' AND hv_parent = (SELECT h_id FROM sge_host WHERE h_hostname = __key_0__) AND hv_time_start <= {ts '__time_end__'} AND hv_time_end > {ts '__time_start__'} ) GROUP BY time_start, time_end

SELECT time_start, time_end, AVG(uv_dvalue) as value FROM ( SELECT TRUNC( uv_time_start, 'DDD' ) as time_start, TRUNC( uv_time_start, 'DDD' ) + INTERVAL '1' DAY as time_end, uv_dvalue FROM sge_user_values WHERE uv_variable = 'h_jobs_finished' AND uv_parent = (SELECT u_id FROM sge_user WHERE u_user = __key_0__) AND uv_time_start <= {ts '__time_end__'} AND uv_time_end > {ts '__time_start__'} ) GROUP BY time_start, time_end

statistic.sql: SELECT (SELECT count(*) AS sge_host FROM sge_host) AS "sge_host", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_queue FROM sge_queue) AS "sge_queue", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_user FROM sge_user) AS "sge_user", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_group FROM sge_group) AS "sge_group", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_project FROM sge_project) AS "sge_project", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_department FROM sge_department) AS "sge_department", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_host_values FROM sge_host_values) AS "sge_host_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_queue_values FROM sge_queue_values) AS "sge_queue_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_user_values FROM sge_user_values) AS "sge_user_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_group_values FROM sge_group_values) AS "sge_group_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_project_values FROM sge_project_values) AS "sge_project_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_department_values FROM sge_department_values) AS "sge_department_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_job FROM sge_job) AS "sge_job", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_job_log FROM sge_job_log) AS "sge_job_log", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_job_request FROM sge_job_request) AS "sge_job_request", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_job_usage FROM sge_job_usage) AS "sge_job_usage", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_share_log FROM sge_share_log) AS "sge_share_log", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_statistic FROM sge_statistic) AS "sge_statistic", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_statistic_values FROM sge_statistic_values) AS "sge_statistic_values", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_ar FROM sge_ar) AS "sge_ar", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_ar_attribute FROM sge_ar_attribute) AS "sge_ar_attribute", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_ar_usage FROM sge_ar_usage) AS "sge_ar_usage", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_ar_log FROM sge_ar_log) AS "sge_ar_log", (SELECT count(*) AS sge_ar_resource_usage FROM sge_ar) AS "sge_ar_resource_usage" from dual
